content: All of the Serpentscale Set Armor and Gear pieces are unlocked upon defeating Whiteclad Noble in Bamboo Grove in Chapter 1 - Black Wind Mountain. You can craft them from any Shrine and once the mandatory boss has been defeated.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Serpentscale_Set.md', within the main section titled 'Serpentscale Set'.
The content is as follows:
All of the Serpentscale Set Armor and Gear pieces are unlocked upon defeating Whiteclad Noble in Bamboo Grove in Chapter 1 - Black Wind Mountain. You can craft them from any Shrine and once the mandatory boss has been defeated.
